name: DEVISTATION NATION
description:
THE ROADS ARE DANGEROUS... 

Playing as a small round boi, it's up to you to make your way through the now bandit-controlled territory in this post apocalyptic top down shooter! Conveniently for us, it seems to go on forever so compare your score with other people online or just try to beat your own highscore!

This game was created by Stepford and SlickRamen for the ScoreSpace Game Jam.
